title: Can I get banned for saying GGYFSA?
body:
After the end of the game?


GGYFSA = Good Game You Fucking Suck Ass

replies.body: We both know you know what is ok and what isn't. Is it negative? Yes. Will you get banned for saying that once? No, that's not how bans work. Can you get banned if you keep doing it and are being reported consistently, especially after prior chat restrictions? Yes, that is how bans work.
No I know you can get banned for saying GGEZ because people are fucking pussies, but GGYFSA? That's a stupid thing to get banned for.
GGYFSA is worse than GGEZ imo.
It's basically the same thing, silly.
Is it necessary? I don't see whats wrong with simply "gg" then move on to the next game.
I think that would fall under unsportsmanlike conduct, so yes.

GGYFSA is probably fine as long as you never tell anyone what it means, since if they don't know they'll generally give you the benefit of the doubt.

Better idea, just make all of your chat in game acronyms. First letter of every word. Never clarify.
Meh... could still get him into trouble... imagine he tried to say something like "Finally a gank!"

To quote Sky Williams...

"Hey, here's an idea. Just don't."
You're toxic. End of story, so yes, you deserved it.
Try gg with racial slurs after
